name: Super BrickSpike
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

Okay, there's no instructions actually in the game, so here they are:

Drag around your character to swing around the other one, and try to destroy the enemies by slamming the weaponized character into the enemies. The faster you slam, the more damage it does. If you slam it hard enough, each character does a special attack...

BRICK - Hold down and drag Spike to use Brick as a weapon. Special: AOE brick attack.

SPIKE - Hold down and drag Brick to use Spike as a weapon. Special: High damage crit on one enemy.

Any character that is not weaponized is vulnerable to enemy bullets, so watch out!

That's it! Go play the game!

CONTROLS:

MOUSE: Move characters

R: Restart Game

ESC: Exit Game

F4: Enter Fullscreen

Enjoy the game! (•◡•)

- DelugeDrop
